meta.job_title: Local Class A CDL Truck Driver

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver automobile parts to dealerships within the Northern Austin area
Operate late model, Penske Truck Leasing trucks with best-in-class specs designed for comfort
Follow federal and state laws, regulations, and/or agency rules, standards, and guidelines for safe and lawful operation

education_certification.credential: Non-Excepted Interstate DOT Medical Card required
